owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

Buy(address,address,uint256,uint256).notice: An event thats emitted when an account buyed token.

DepositaryChanged(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an Depositary contract address changed.

IssuerChanged(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an Issuer contract address changed.

PauserChanged(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an pauser address changed.

TokenAllowed(address).notice: An event emitted when token allowed.

TokenDenied(address).notice: An event emitted when token denied.

TreasuryChanged(address).notice: An event thats emitted when an Treasury contract address changed.

buy(address,uint256).notice: Buy stable token with ERC20 payment token amount.

pauser().notice: Address that can pause a contract.
